, made his second, headline-grabbing appearance at Britain's inquiry into the Iraq war. Some speculate that the Tony Blair appearance was exactly why Andy Coulson announced his resignation. Speaking Friday, David Cameron said: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. " Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government, David Cameron said.
